thread.title: One Direction's next single is 'Perfect' and it's out next week - Music
thread.title_full: One Direction's next single is 'Perfect' and it's out next week - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Lewis Corner
title: One Direction's next single is 'Perfect' and it's out next week - Music
text: One Direction's next single is called 'Perfect' and their fans have already whipped themselves into a frenzy for it.The boyband will release the new track worldwide on October 16 as the second cut to be lifted from upcoming album Made In The A.M., which follows on November 13. The track has been described as "an emotionally charged ironic love song featuring passionate drumming, rousing guitars, shimmering synths and an immense chorus" in a press release.'Perfect' was produced by Julian Bunetta, Jesse Shatkin and AFTERHRS, and co-written by Harry Styles and Louis Tomlinson alongside Bunetta, Shatkin, Jacob Kasher, John Ryan and Maureen Anne McDonald.Fans were already aware that the new single was on its way after Apple Music accidentally tweeted about its release earlier today (October 9). Â© Rex Features / David Fisher 'Perfect' will serve as the follow-up to their chart-topping single 'Drag Me Down', as well as recent buzz track 'Infinity'.Meanwhile, Justin Bieber recently claimed that 1D decided to release their new album on the same day as his in order to generate publicity.
